players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie was a good person, I'm sad he's gone. We need to figure out who did this and make sure it doesn't happen again."
Diana: "Bob's behavior has been suspicious from the start, I think he might be involved in Charlie's death."
Bob: "Bob was the one who killed Charlie. I acted suspiciously because I needed to gather information and plan my next move."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, he killed Charlie. We should lynch him to keep our town safe."
You: "I think we should lynch Bob, he's the most suspicious person in this town. We can't let him continue to threaten our safety."
